titles.title: We Worship You, O God In This Temple

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We worship You, O God in this temple.
We worship You in spirit and in truth.
You inhabit our praises
And Your presence dwells among us.
We worship You in spirit and truth,
In spirit and truth.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For it's a new day of restoration.
Zion is restored into the light.
The praises of God's people are within her.
We're worshipping our God with all our might.
